thread.title: John Wall, Brandon Jennings Threatened on Video Outside LA Nightclub
thread.title_full: John Wall, Brandon Jennings Threatened on Video Outside LA Nightclub

author: Mike Chiari
title: John Wall, Brandon Jennings Threatened on Video Outside LA Nightclub
text: John Wall, Brandon Jennings Threatened on Video Outside LA Nightclub David Liam Kyle/Getty Images Washington Wizards guards John Wall and Brandon Jennings were threatened outside a Los Angeles club Tuesday night. TMZ Sports passed along footage from the scene (video contains profanity): The incident occurred after the Wiz defeated the L.A. Lakers 119-108. Per TMZ Sports , Wall and Jennings didn't retaliate against the man who threatened them, and he was later seen being friendly with Wizards guard Bradley Beal. By virtue of Tuesday's win, the Wizards moved within two games of the Boston Celtics for first place in the Eastern Conference and 1.5 games behind the Cleveland Cavaliers for second. Wall led all scorers with 34 points and added 14 assists in the victory. Like the new article format? !
